io.hekate.messaging.unicast

Class ResponseFuture<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>
      • io.hekate.util.HekateFuture<T,MessagingFuture<T>>
        • io.hekate.messaging.MessagingFuture<Response<T>>
          • io.hekate.messaging.unicast.ResponseFuture<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Base type of request message.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompletionStage<Response<T>>, Future<Response<T>>

    public class ResponseFuture<T>
extends MessagingFuture<Response<T>>
    Asynchronous result of request(...) operation.
    See Also:
    MessagingChannel.request(Object)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResponseFuture

        public ResponseFuture()

    • Method Detail

      • response

        public T response(long timeout,
                  TimeUnit unit)
           throws MessagingFutureException,
                  InterruptedException,
                  TimeoutException
        Awaits for the asynchronous operation to complete within the timeout and returns the payload of reply. Throws TimeoutException if timeout happens before operation results are ready.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Time to wait for operation result.
        unit - Time unit of the timeout argument
        Returns:
        Response.
        Throws:
        MessagingFutureException - Signals that request operation failed.
        TimeoutException - Signals that timeout happened.
        InterruptedException - Signals that thread was interrupted while awaiting for operation completion.

      • response

        public T response()
           throws MessagingFutureException,
                  InterruptedException
        Awaits for the asynchronous operation to complete and returns the payload of reply.
        Returns:
        Response.
        Throws:
        MessagingFutureException - Signals that request operation failed.
        InterruptedException - Signals that thread was interrupted while awaiting for operation completion.

      • responseUninterruptedly

        public T responseUninterruptedly()
                          throws MessagingFutureException
        Uninterruptedly awaits for the asynchronous operation to complete and returns the payload of reply.

        Note: if thread gets interrupted while awaiting for operation to complete then such interruption will be ignored and thread's interrupted flag will be set to true after operation completion.

        Returns:
        Response.
        Throws:
        MessagingFutureException - Signals that request operation failed.
